sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-main>
    <v-container fill-height fluid>
      <v-layout align-center justify-center>
        <v-flex md6 sm6 xs12>



            <v-row>
              <v-col
                  cols="12"
                  sm="6"
              >
                <v-date-picker
                    v-model="dates"
                    range
                ></v-date-picker>
              </v-col>
              <v-col
                  cols="12"
                  sm="6"
              >
                <v-text-field
                    v-model="dateRangeText"
                    label="Date range"
                    prepend-icon="mdi-calendar"
                    readonly
                ></v-text-field>
                model: {{ dates }}
              </v-col>
            </v-row>




            <v-card
                class="mt-4 mx-auto"
                max-width="400"
            >
              <v-sheet
                  class="v-sheet--offset mx-auto"
                  color="cyan"
                  elevation="12"
                  max-width="calc(100% - 32px)"
              >
                <v-sparkline
                    :labels="dates"
                    :value="value"
                    color="white"
                    line-width="2"
                    padding="16"
                ></v-sparkline>
              </v-sheet>


            </v-card>


        </v-flex>
      </v-layout>
    </v-container>
  </v-main>
</template>

<script>
import moment from 'moment';
export default {
  data: () => ({
    labels: [
      '15.04',
      '16.04',
      '17.04',
      '18.04',
      '19.04',
      '20.04',
      '21.04',
      '22.04',
    ],
    value: [
      200,
      675,
      410,
      390,
      310,
      460,
      250,
      240,
    ],
    dates: ['2021-09-10', '2021-09-20'],
  }),
  computed: {
    dateRangeText () {
      return this.dates.join(' ~ ')
    },
    getDate(){
      let arr = [
        {id:1,fromDate:'2019-06-01',toDate:'2019-06-05'},
      ]

      let tempDates = []

      arr.forEach(element => {

        let now = moment()

        let fromDate = moment(element.fromDate)
        let toDate = moment(element.toDate)

        if (fromDate > now && toDate > now) {
          while (fromDate <= toDate) {
            let ld = fromDate.format('YYYY-MM-DD')
            tempDates.push(ld)
            fromDate = moment(fromDate).add(1,'days');
          }
        }

      })
      console.log('dates', tempDates);
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-sheet--offset {
  top: -24px;
  position: relative;
}
</style>
